name: Stray Mateys
description:
Stray on an island.  No one but your matey.

Find all 8 treasures before leaving this place.

Collect booties, sail away and explore this island!

-------- GAMEPLAY --------

You start on an island and your captain orders you to find all the secret treasures this island offers before leaving.

So you hop onto your ship and start exploring. Every island has couple of chests for you to obtain. 8 in total. You can pick them up and drop them in your ship. Then return back to your captain and drop the chests in front of him.

Do you think you can find all 8 treasures?

Let's see!

-------- CONTROLS --------

Pirate Movement : A W S D

Running : Left Shift

Jumping : Spacebar

Interact / Disconnect : Left Mouse Click

Toggle Map : M

Ship Movement : Mouse to rotate, AWSD to move

-------- MAP --------

-------- CREDITS --------

Ahmet Taha Aydemir

This game was a solo project by me. I am developer at core. So I did all the scripting but some of the art assets used in this project is from the asset store.  I will be linking them below. 

Also, I couldn't fit the whole project into my schedule. So there are some missing components. I wanted implement a functionality to chests so that when they are delivered to the captain, they give you a random gift. I thought it would be good for the theme but what can I do.

I wanted to explain myself incase the game feels a bit pointless :)

I love low poly art style. I hope you do too.

Thank you for playing my game <3
